dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: Copyright violations
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 27, 2004 9:34 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: Copyright violations]

Forwarding to Legal for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Re: Copyright violations
Date:         Sun, 26 Sep 2004 19:04:32 EDT
From:         LadyhawkesStar@aol.com
To:         LadyhawkesStar@aol.com, abuse@theplanet.com, admin@theplanet.com,
temon@myself.com



The administrator of the site has very graciously just answered my
concerns and the posts in question have been removed. Thank you very much.

In a message dated 9/26/2004 6:26:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
LadyhawkesStar writes:

> Subj: *Copyright violations *
> Date: 9/26/2004 6:26:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time
> From: LadyhawkesStar <mailto:LadyhawkesStar>
> To: abuse@theplanet.com <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>, 
> admin@theplanet.com <mailto:admin@theplanet.com>, temon@myself.com 
> <mailto:temon@myself.com>
>
>
>
> A website registered by a native of India, www.egyptclub.net is in
> violation of copyright laws, having posted a number of items in its 
> forums that are mine. One of their posters is not only claiming 
> ownership but she is also drawing bandwidth from my site in 
> republishing my material. The copyright notice was clear on each page, 
> she removed it before posting it publically. I believe this web 
> address is hosted through your server.
>
> I have written the administrator who's email is included above but I 
> fear it is a fake address. Can you help me? I will be glad to fax you 
> a notarized document with my claim to the above.
>
> Brenda Hager
> Huntington, WV USA
>
> Your address was obtained through a neotrace search. If it is in error 
> and this site is not hosted by your server, then please excuse this email.
>
> "We learn from what hurts us as much as from what loves us" 




"We learn from what hurts us as much as from what loves us"

-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
